entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
